mapper.sql: bhiel.ht_inspection_exempted_list_id, bhiel.inspection_exempted_list_id, bhiel.material_id, bhiel.customer_id, bhiel.supplier_id, bhiel.obj_type, bhiel.`status`, bhiel.remark, bhiel.org_id, bhiel.create_user_id, bhiel.create_time, bhiel.modified_user_id, bhiel.modified_time, bhiel.is_delete
mapper.select:
SELECT, bm.material_code,bm.material_name, bs.supplier_code,bs.supplier_name, bc.supplier_code as customer_code,bc.supplier_name as customer_name, su.user_name as create_user_name, sus.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name FROM fantech_imes_v2.base_ht_inspection_exempted_list bhiel LEFT JOIN fantech_imes_v2.base_material bm ON bhiel.material_id= bm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes_v2.base_supplier bs ON bhiel.supplier_id= bs.supplier_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes_v2.base_supplier bc ON bhiel.customer_id= bc.supplier_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON bhiel.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user sus ON bhiel.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes_v2.base_organization bo ON bhiel.org_id = bo.organization_id
and bm.material_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and bm.material_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{materialName},'%')
and bs.supplier_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplierCode},'%')
and bs.supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplierName},'%')
and bc.supplier_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{customerCode},'%')
and bc.supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{customerName},'%')
and bhiel.status = #{status}
and date_format(bhiel.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by bhiel.modified_time desc
